Tempe.Chaparral Lake:
Chaparral Lake is located in Chaparral Park in west Scottsdale, at the northeast corner of Hayden and Chaparral Roads.


== Fish species ==
Rainbow trout
Largemouth bass
Sunfish
Catfish (channel)
Catfish (flathead)
Tilapia
Carp
